name: AstroSeal
description:
Controls:
W - Increase Thrust
S - Decrease Thrust
A - Rotate Left
D - Rotate Right

The evil space bugs have overtaken your home world. You are the last of a race of seals which can breathe in space, an AstroSeal if you will. Collect as many starfish as you can before your fuel runs out. Avoid space bugs hungry for your fuel.
